content: This combination of strong bookings and churn performance resulted in core revenue of $165.9 million and transaction adjusted EBITDA of $58.6 million representing year-over-year growth of 6.2% and 4.5%, respectively. Total revenue for the quarter increased by $9.5 million or 5.5% year-over-year to $182.4 million, while recurring revenue increased by $9 million or 5.5% year-over-year to $173.7 million on the back of great customer engagement and strong overall demand. Well, I do think there's pricing opportunity, Sami, I do want to kind of mention we are -- from a retail perspective, we have customers that are in multiple markets that grow is across the globe. Michael, please go ahead. Michael, please go ahead.
